name: MLClassifierMetrics
desc: Metrics you use to evaluate a classifier’s performance.

items.name: var classificationError: Double
items.desc: The fraction of incorrectly labeled examples.

items.name: var precisionRecall: MLDataTable
items.desc: A data table listing the precision and recall percentages for each category.

items.name: var confusion: MLDataTable
items.desc: A table comparing the actual and predicted labels for each classification category.

items.name: var isValid: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the classifier model was able to calculate metrics.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error present when the metrics are invalid.

items.name: init(classificationError: Double, confusion: MLDataTable, precisionRecall: MLDataTable)
items.desc: Creates classifier metrics describing the quality of your model.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the classifier metrics.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the classifier metrics that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the classifier metrics shown in a playground.
